about_the_game:
"Death is always final
and a new life always begins with birth;
in the beginning of all things
and without any memories.”

the fairytale of DEATH is a text adventure that should never have been written ..


A kingdom in a distant past - dead, intrigue, a nameless pursuer ...
A story that is told to you like from a fairy tale book. A fairy tale that can only be finished through wise decisions.

Find out the truth about your destiny before death takes you - or die without this knowledge.

KEY ELEMENTS


  • Let yourself be told a story that takes you into a world that could hardly be more sad.
  • Slip into the role of the protagonist who wakes up in an unreal dungeon without memories.
  • Make decisions based on information about the history and situation you are in.
  • Overcome traps and obstacles that reveal themselves on your path to truth.
